body:
I wanted to install it, but my Anti Virus picked it up as harmful. I searched online to see if it was safe, and most of them said it was, but not in a very direct way. Has any of you used OBS? If so, is it safe?

Also, OBS is basically a screen recording program.

Thanks
FrankenRavi
body_tagged:
I wanted to install it, but my Anti Virus picked it up as harmful. I searched online to see if it was safe, and most of them said it was, but not in a very direct way. Has any of you used OBS? If so, is it safe?

title: Is OBS (Open Broadcaster Software) Safe?

replies.body: It is safe, I had no problems when I downloaded it.
replies.body_tagged: It is safe, I had no problems when I downloaded it.

replies.body: It's safe, the best recording software plus it's free.
replies.body_tagged: It's safe, the best recording software plus it's free.

replies.body: I find OBS to be (imo) one of the best recording/streaming software out there, and it being free is a huge bonus.
replies.body_tagged: I find OBS to be (imo) one of the best recording/streaming software out there, and it being free is a huge bonus.
